Package persistence.json.adventure

Class AdventureJsonDAO

java.lang.Object
persistence.json.adventure.AdventureJsonDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdventureDAO
public class AdventureJsonDAO extends Object implements AdventureDAO
Class that implements the methods described in the AdventureDAO interface, and will be used as a way to physically separate the persistence layer from the rest of the application.

Specifically, it implements the adventure persistence in a JSON file.

    AdventureJsonDAO(String path)
    Parametrized constructor to persist adventures in a JSON file, while being able to read adventure information.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdventureJsonDAO

      public AdventureJsonDAO(String path) throws PersistenceException
      Parametrized constructor to persist adventures in a JSON file, while being able to read adventure information.
      Parameters:
      path - a string representation of the file path to open (or create if it doesn't exist)
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if something goes wrong when opening/creating the file (including but not limited to the path being malformed)

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      public ArrayList<Adventure> getAll()
      Method that reads the persisted information of all adventures.
      Specified by:
      getAll in interface AdventureDAO
      Returns:
      an arrayList representing all the adventures.

      public void save(Adventure adventure) throws PersistenceException
      Method that saves a specific adventure, persisting its information.
      Specified by:
      save in interface AdventureDAO
      Parameters:
      adventure - the adventure to save
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if something goes wrong when opening/creating the file (including but not limited to the path being malformed)

    • checkUniqueName

      public boolean checkUniqueName(String name)
      Method that checks whether the adventure's name introduced by the user already exists in the system.
      Specified by:
      checkUniqueName in interface AdventureDAO
      Parameters:
      name - a string representation of the name inputted by the user
      Returns:
      a boolean representation of weather the name is unique or not.
